title: Update Home hero typing words to include “Debugger”

requirements.text: Update the Home page hero typing animation word list (the `typingWords` constant in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`) to exactly: ['Developer','Designer','Database','Debugger','DevOps'] in that order.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx` defines `typingWords` with exactly 5 entries in this order: Developer, Designer, Database, Debugger, DevOps.
The Home hero headline continues to render as "Full-Stack" followed by the animated typing word, and the animation cycles through the updated list without runtime errors.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or anything in `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing components instead).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Do not change typing animation speed, caret styling, or the TypingWord component behavior beyond updating the provided word list.
Do not change any backend logic or data models.
